item.title: Berserk or Die
item.description:
Title: Berserk or Die
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Nao Games
Publisher: poncle
Franchise: poncle
Release Date: Jun 8, 2025




About This Game

You are the last soldier left on the battlefield.

With enemies approaching from both sides, rally the last of your willpower in one final push to victory. Go berserk, or die!

Face danger head-on as your only way to move is attacking to your left or right. Stronger foes await you in the later days of battle, so ensure to spend your gold with the nightly Peddlers to heal, purchase new weapons, obtain new relics, and survive to fight another day.

Unique Combat Controls

The game's most distinctive feature is the keyboard-banging controls, which make the battles all the more thrilling. The more buttons pressed, the wider the attack range. Continue attacking to unleash a powerful attack to eliminate a large number of enemies in one fell swing. Charge your Special bar to show your full might to your foes with an even grander display of power. Game pads are also supported.

Peddler

A lone Peddler will sell you wares at the end of each survived day. Heal your wounds, buy upgrades, and purchase rarities to continue the fight.

Choose your fighter

Survive as characters from through the ages, and equip a wide array of weapon choices from the Armory. Ensure you see another night by using Swords, Katanas, Greataxe's, Staffs and more on your journey to victory.

Starting Tips:

  • Press more keys and hit a wider amount of enemies. Bang the keys!

  • Spend your gold on upgrades, you won't take it with you to the afterlife

  • Remember to spend your experience points to increase your power

  • Open your loot to unlock new and powerful weapons in the Armory

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
    • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 400 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 400 MB available space

item.title: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
item.description:
Title: Squeakross: Home Squeak Home
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Alblune
Publisher: Alblune
Release Date: Jun 7, 2025




About This Game

Ever dreamed of being a home owner? Welcome to the Squeakross: Home Squeak Home program!

You just got into a fresh new home for your tiny rodent friend, but… it’s empty! Solve puzzles from the Home Squeak Home Catalog and transform them into splendid furniture and accessories to dress it up!

  • Relaxing Puzzle Solving : Learn how to play in 5 minutes, and solve logic-numbers puzzles at your rhythm , no time pressure.

  • Scared of puzzles? Worry not! Your rodent friend is here to help. Customize your game experience: Toggle hints , Solve a random cell, or use the brand new Logic-Assist system that lets you preview possible solutions!

  • No assistance needed? You can disable all those options if you prefer to be challenged.

Our Home Squeak Home catalog features many different styles of interior decor, from basic housing supplies to extravagant ones to match a broad range of tastes. You will also find many accessories to dress your rodent friend.

Aaah… The joy of seeing a Squeakross puzzle transform into a beautiful object is so satisfying!

Shape your rodent to your liking in the world's first Rodent Editor (we think??). From snout to tail, decide what kind of friend you want to have by your side!

Made for rodent lovers by rodent lovers, we made sure to offer plenty of options for you to be able to recreate your beloved pets in game.

FEATURES:

  • A Nonogram game like no other.

  • 650 puzzles to solve!

  • Relaxing puzzle-solving, with no time limit, mindful of new players.

  • Logic-Assist system that lets you preview possible solutions.

  • Decorate your home with hundreds of unique furniture.

  • Create and customize your own rodent with accessories.

  • Customize your user interface with unlockable stickers made by Eon.

  • Receive tips and lore from Nini, the owner of Home Squeak Home Inc.

  • "Streamer mode" to turn off Content ID tagged music

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Camper Van: Make it Home
item.description:
Title: Camper Van: Make it Home
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Malapata Studio
Publisher: Malapata Studio , Wings
Release Date: Jun 7, 2025




About This Game

Make space in yourself for both your belongings and your own journey of discovery, all in one cozy van. In Camper Van: Make It Home, you’ll use block organization puzzles and interior design to customize your camper van into a dream home-on-wheels. Play around with each of your decoration items to discover their surprises and possibilities as you discover your own.

⋆˙⟡ Zen Puzzles ⟡˙⋆

Feel the satisfaction of organizing all the items in your luggage. Find the ideal place where each object fits perfectly or experiment with them at random. Play at your own pace, without pressure; this is meant to be a meditative and creative experience.

⋆˙⟡ Progression and Outside Decoration ⟡˙⋆

Obtain new vans to decorate as you progress in your journey. In addition to the interior, you can design the van’s outside area and make it as comfortable as possible.

⋆˙⟡ Various Destinations ⟡˙⋆

Adapt the van to the different destinations you’ll reach. Travel to the beach, visit a snowy plain, settle in the forest, and stop by cliffs during the different stages of your journey.

⋆˙⟡ Furry Friends ⟡˙⋆

Interact with a very special fellow traveller to keep you company on a journey of self-discovery.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Lies of P: Overture
item.description:
Title: Lies of P: Overture
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: NEOWIZ
Publisher: NEOWIZ
Franchise: NEOWIZ
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025




About This Content

Cross the Bounds of Time

Lies of P: Overture is a dramatic prequel to the acclaimed soulslike action RPG, Lies of P. It transports you to the city of Krat in its final days of haunting, late-19th-century Belle Époque beauty. On the brink of the Puppet Frenzy massacre, you follow a legendary Stalker—a mysterious guide—through untold stories and chilling secrets. As Geppetto’s deadly puppet, you’ll journey through Krat and its surroundings, uncover hidden backstories, and face epic battles that shape the past and future of Lies of P.

“Geppetto’s puppet… We need your help.”

Return to the City of Krat.

Discover Its Unexplored Horror and Splendor.

Venture into a past Krat when its Belle Époque elegance faces impending ruin. Explore majestic, never-before-seen locations, from extravagant landmarks on its outskirts to opulent mansions and eerie, haunted ruins.

Confront formidable new enemies and uncover secrets hidden within the city’s decaying grandeur.

Travel Back in Time.

Meet the Legendary Stalker.

Before the awakening lies the truth. Join Lea, the Legendary Stalker, on her relentless path of vengeance. A veil is lifted to reveal a hidden chapter of Krat's dark past.

Discover untold stories behind both new and familiar characters as you explore the gripping drama and mysteries that shape this rich and haunting world.

Forge New Weapons.

Master New Combat Styles.

Cunning enemies lurk within unfamiliar labyrinths and treacherous terrain, waiting to end your story. Ruthless, punishing, and even majestic, these adversaries will test your mettle. Only the most resourceful, doughty, and daring will prevail.

As you delve deeper into its expanded world you'll unlock powerful new armaments, including a brand-new arsenal of weapon combinations and Legion Arms, giving you unprecedented freedom to forge a combat style uniquely yours.

Overcome Treacherous Odds.

Face intense, high-stakes encounters through Krat’s labyrinths and various surroundings.

Confront powerful new bosses and enemies as you fight to uncover the mysteries of a world teetering on the edge of collapse.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This product contains violence, blood and gore, as well as fear elements.



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description:
Title: Dragon Is Dead
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: TeamSuneat
Publisher: PM Studios, inc.
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game

Prologue

The black dragon [Guernian], who once faced down the gods, has fallen. From the rift he fled before his death, an unholy energy has spread across the world, and life is undergoing a bizarre mutation. People call it Corruption and live their days in fear, but few know its trustworthy source and full extent.

Player = Successor

You are an immortal warrior, a so-called Successor, chosen by the God of Light [Lu], the God of Fire [Ashuran], and the God of Water [Harnia]. When you die in battle, you return to the source of your lineage and are resurrected, growing stronger through the experience, equipment, and rune power you accumulate along the way. Arriving in Cliffshire, a town of light, the Successors must head to a burial ground where demons are said to be manifesting and follow clues to cleanse the distorted world.

Core Gameplay

The game plays out as 2D platformer action requiring precise dodging and pattern-breaking. Each area is a vertically and horizontally intertwined, multi-layered structure that regenerates in a rogue-lite fashion with different terrain, monster placement, and loot composition on each exploration. When you die, you lose your gold and temporary buffs, but your gear and runes are permanently preserved and become the basis for the next cycle. Defeating bosses yields rune stones that can be used to craft or awaken legendary gear, and artifacts found during exploration can bring both powerful blessings and dangerous curses depending on the combination, providing new tactical tension each time.

The current situation

Corrupted enemies are gradually expanding their territory, threatening neighboring regions. In this chaos, the Black Dawn is leading the Corruption from behind the scenes, but their true purpose is shrouded in mystery. Lore says that only by destroying the [Guernians] will the lost order return, but the deeper you explore, the more you question the truth of even this belief. The closer you get to the citadel, the more you'll come face-to-face with the greater secret that brought the world to its knees.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: windows 10+
    • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia 450 Gts / Radeon HD 5750 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
    Recommended:
    • OS: windows 10+
    • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
